name: BackRoadsChurch
0:
”Alexa, open back roads church”
”Alexa, ask back roads church for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start back roads church”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: back roads church
des: Listen to the latest talks from Back Roads Church. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current message. You can also ask for previous and next messages by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". Thank you for listening.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
